No 0654.02/105						Faculty of Business Administration

								And Liberal Arts

Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna

128 Huay Kaew Road, Chang Puek,

Mueang, Chiang Mai 50300

THAILAND

20 September B.E. 2567 (2024)

Dear Ms.Logini Sulochona Annamalai,

Subject: Request for Acceptance of Student Trainee

The Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts, Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna (RMUTL), would like to propose the placement of the following 4th-year student majoring in the International Business Management Program as trainee in your esteemed organization:

Miss Anna Scott

In line with our Internship Program in International Affairs course, the objective of this program is to integrate theoretical learning with practical experience in a professional environment. The faculty respectfully requests that your organization consider accepting this student for practical training. We propose that the student undertakes a full-time trainee position. The proposed training period is scheduled for the second semester of the 2024 academic year, from 18 November B.E. 2567 (2024) to 7 March B.E. 2568 (2025).

If you find this proposal acceptable, kindly complete and return the attached 'Acceptance Student Trainee Form' via email to sjariangprasert@gmail.com.

Sincerely your¬≠s,







(Associate Professor Kanthana Ditkaew)

Dean, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts                







International Business Management Program 

Tel: +66 835700055



Acceptance Student Trainee Form

To:  Dean, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts

Refer to Letter: No. 0654.02/105 	register 20 September B.E. 2567 (2024)

In reference to your request for our organization to accept a 4th-year undergraduate student from the International Business Management Program, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts, Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna (RMUTL), for an internship during the second semester of the academic year 2024, from 18 November B.E. 2567 (2024) to 7 March B.E. 2568 (2025), we have reviewed your request and would like to inform you of our decision as follows:

		üûè We are pleased to confirm our willingness to accept the following student for an internship:

		1. Miss Watcharaporn Ingkawara

Job Position / Job Description for Student at the Organization:

‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.

‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.

	    	üûè We regret to inform you that we are unable to accept any student for the internship at this time.		

Please be informed accordingly.

Sincerely,



(‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶)

02_Introduction_Letter_Internship.docx.content:
No 0654.02/127						Faculty of Business Administration

								And Liberal Arts

Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna

128 Huay Kaew Road, Chang Puek,

Mueang, Chiang Mai 50300

THAILAND

29 October B.E. 2567 (2024)

Dear Ms.Praephan Chaisaowwong,

Subject: Request for Internship Program Student Placement

In accordance with your kind support for accepting an undergraduate student from the Bachelor‚Äôs Degree Program in International Business Management, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts, Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna, for his internship placement in your organization, we would like to submit the following student for his internship:

1. Mr.Naratthaphume  Ritcharatphan

We are sending one student to report for his internship in the second semester of the academic year 2024, from 18 November B.E. 2567 (2024) to 7 March B.E. 2568 (2025). Upon completion of the student‚Äôs internship, we kindly ask you to evaluate his performance using the enclosed evaluation form and return it to the International Business Management Program, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts, Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna, via email at sjariangprasert@gmail.com, or place it in a sealed envelope with the student.

We sincerely appreciate your generosity in accepting our student for his internship at your organization and hope to receive your continued support in the future.

Sincerely your¬≠s,







(Associate Professor Kanthana Ditkaew)

Dean, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts                



International Business Management Program 

Tel: +66 835700055

No 0654.02/105						Faculty of Business Administration

Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna

Mueang, Chiang Mai 50300

THAILAND

20 September B.E. 2567 (2024)

Dear Ms.Logini Sulochona Annamalai

Subject: Request for Acceptance of Student Trainee

The Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts, Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna (RMUTL), would like to propose the placement of Miss Watcharaporn Ingkawara, 4th-year student majoring in the International Business Management Program, as trainee students          in your esteemed organization.

In line with our Cooperative Education in International Affairs course, the objective of this program is to integrate theoretical learning with practical experience in a professional environment. The faculty respectfully requests that your organization consider accepting these students for practical training. We propose that the students undertake full-time trainee positions, during which they will be required to complete a project. This project should address a minor issue or challenge faced by your organization. The proposed training period is scheduled for the second semester of the 2024 academic year, from 17 November B.E. 2567 (2024) to 17 May B.E. 2568 (2025).

If you find this proposal acceptable, kindly complete and return the attached 'Acceptance Student Trainee Form' via email to sjariangprasert@gmail.com.

Sincerely your¬≠s,







(Associate Professor Kanthana Ditkaew)

Dean, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts                





International Business Management Program 

Tel: +66 835700055

03_Introduction_Letter_Cooperative_Educa.content:
No 0654.02/112						Faculty of Business Administration

								And Liberal Arts

Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna

128 Huay Kaew Road, Chang Puek,

Mueang, Chiang Mai 50300

THAILAND

4 October B.E. 2567 (2024)

Dear Mr.Edward Chryslo Abraham

Subject: Submission of Student Trainee

We would like to express our sincere gratitude for your willingness to accommodate a student from the International Business Management Program at the Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts, Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna (RMUTL), as a student trainee in your esteemed organization. 

The faculty hereby requests permission to send the following student to undertake an internship during the academic year 2024:

1. Miss Watcharaporn Ingkawara

The proposed internship period is from 2 December B.E. 2567 (2024) to 9 May B.E. 2568 (2025). Upon completion of the internship, we kindly ask for your evaluation of the student‚Äôs performance based on the internship evaluation form we have provided. We would appreciate it if you could return the completed form to the International Business Management Program at Rajamangala University of Technology Lanna.

We sincerely appreciate your support in accepting our student for the internship program, and we hope for your continued collaboration in the future. Thank you for your consideration.

  			   Sincerely your¬≠s,







         (Associate Professor Kanthana Ditkaew)

      Dean, Faculty of Business Administration and Liberal Arts                



International Business Management Program 

Tel: +66 835700055
